name: blogmachine
description: Lightweight JS blogging engine for joenoodles.com
author: Joe Nudell

scripts.start-dev: { ( cd ./dist ; NODE_ENV=development DEBUG=true node --harmony app.js ) & } ; npm run get-app-pid
scripts.stop: npm run get-app-pid && cat ./dist/.app-pid | xargs kill && rm ./dist/.app-pid
scripts.compile-ss-js: cp ./src/app.js ./dist/app.js && cp ./src/BlogResource.js ./dist/BlogResource.js && cp -r ./src/stores ./dist/stores && cp -r ./src/util ./dist/util && jsx --harmony -x jsx ./src/components ./dist/components
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run compile-ss-js && npm run build-js-dev && npm run build-html-dev && npm run start-dev && npm run watch
